mapper.select: SELECT CDNO cdno, CDLVL cdlv, UPCD highcd, CDNAME cdnm, USEYN use FROM CODEMNG CONNECT BY NOCYCLE CDNO = UPCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY CDNO ASC
SELECT CDNO cdno, CDLVL cdlv, UPCD highcd, CDNAME cdnm, USEYN use FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = #{cdno}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CODEMNG VALUES(
(SELECT 'C'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(CDNO),2,5)+1,1),4,'0') FROM CODEMNG), #{cdlv}, #{highcd}, #{cdnm}, '관리자', sysdate, #{use} )
mapper.select: SELECT CDNO cdno, CDNAME cdnm FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDLVL = 1
SELECT CDNO cdno, CDNAME cdnm FROM CODEMNG where UPCD = #{cdno}

SELECT ITEMCD itemcd, ITEMNAME itemnm, MADENMCD madenmcd, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = #{cdno}) brand, ITEMUNITCD itemunitcd, DECODE(ITEMUNITCD,'C0061', '개', 'C0062', '벌') itemunitcdnm, STOCKAMT stockamt, STOCKYN stockyn, USEYN use FROM ITEMLIST WHERE MADENMCD = #{cdno}

SELECT ITEMCD itemcd, ITEMNAME itemnm, (SELECT CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE CDNO = (SELECT MADENMCD FROM ITEMLIST WHERE ITEMCD = #{itemcd})) brand, DECODE(ITEMUNITCD,'C0061', '개', 'C0062', '벌') itemunitcd, USEYN use FROM ITEMLIST WHERE ITEMCD = #{itemcd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMLIST VALUES( (SELECT 'I'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(ITEMCD),2,5)+1,1),4,'0') FROM ITEMLIST), '아이폰8', 'C0051', 'C0061', (SELECT NVL(MAX(STOCKAMT)+1,1) FROM ITEMLIST WHERE ITEMCD = (SELECT 'I'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(ITEMCD),2,5)+1,1),4,'0') FROM ITEMLIST)), 'N', '관리자', sysdate, 'N' , 'C0000' )
